Service Details: - Generates funds to support Community programs by offering quality items for sale- Items include clothing and accessories, shoes, purses, bags and belts, furniture (including antiques), vintage collectibles, jewelry, books, small household appliances, housewares and kitchen goods, decorative items, paintings and artwork, working electronics, luggage, wedding gowns and formal wear, sporting equipment, small musical instruments, CD’s, DVD’s, VHS and records, linens, bedding and curtains, seasonal decorations (in the appropriate season)
Address & Map: 3531 Old Okanagan Hwy, Unit 101West Kelowna, BC     V4T 3L7View MapQuest Map
Major Intersection: Old Okanagan Hwy and Butt Road
